sentence: 1 |||  ||| 0.1 ||| OBJECTIVE: To compare the efficacy and safety of ti-trated oral misoprostol and vaginal misoprostol for labor induction.

sentence: 3 |||  ||| 0.3 ||| The titrated oral misoprostol group received a basal unit of 20 mL misoprostol solution (1 mcg/mL) every 1 hour for four doses and then were titrated against individual uterine response.
content: The titrated oral misoprostol group received a basal unit of 20 mL misoprostol solution (1 mcg/mL) every 1 hour for four doses
label: i.Procedure

sentence: 2 |||  ||| 0.2 ||| METHODS: Women between 34 and 42 weeks of gestation with an unfavorable cervix (Bishop score less than or equal to 6) and an indication for labor induction were randomLy assigned to receive titrated oral or vaginal misoprostol.
content: Women between 34 and 42 weeks of gestation with an unfavorable cervix (Bishop score less than or equal to 6) and an indication for labor induction
label: po.PhyConditon

sentence: 19 ||| MATERIALS AND METHODS ||| 1.6 ||| Women assigned to the vaginal misoprostol group received 25 mcg every 4 hours until attaining a more favorable cervix (Bishop score greater than or equal to 7) or adequate uterine activity (greater than or equal to three contractions in 10 minutes) or entering active labor.
content: Women assigned to the vaginal misoprostol group received 25 mcg every 4 hours
label: i.Procedure

sentence: 41 ||| MATERIALS AND METHODS ||| 1.28 ||| The secondary measures used to evaluate efficacy or safety included total dosage of misoprostol, rate of women given oxytocin, cesarean delivery and induction failure, neonatal outcomes including lower Apgar score (less than 7 at 5 minutes), and admittance to the neonatal unit.

sentence: 11 |||  ||| 0.11 ||| CONCLUSION: Titrated oral misoprostol is associated with a lower incidence of uterine hyperstimulation and a here are many indications for term labor inductions , including postterm pregnancy, preeclamp-sia, diabetes mellitus, oligohydramnios, intrauterine fetal growth restriction, and abnormal antepartum fetal surveillance results.

sentence: 109 ||| DISCUSSION ||| 3.23 ||| The most important finding of this study was the significantly lower cesarean delivery rate in the women who received the titrated oral misoprostol regimen.
